name: 04-quiet-divtober-2022-
title: 04. Quiet: Divtober 2022
description: This entry for #divtober was trying to simplify after Day 3 didn't come out as I would like it. Once complete I added in a touch of animation just to give it a bit of life.  There is a time-lapse video of making this piece at https://youtu.be/c9RW1PzTtXQ
